description: Paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera 'Golden Shadow') is an amazing plant species due to its unique golden foliage and vibrant multi-seasonal beauty. Its leaves are a bright yellow-green in Spring, turning a purplish-bronze in Fall. In Summer, the foliage is a soft, vibrant yellowish-green, making it a show-stopper in the garden. The leaves are also incredibly thick and leathery, making them very durable. Furthermore, it develops beautiful fruit clusters in late summer, filled with an abundance of small red fruits. Paper mulberry is an ideal low maintenance plant, with it being extremely hardy and drought-tolerant, perfect for any garden.
